reviewText:
I recommend this game with one important caveat:

The caveat is that you have the attention span, and the patience, and make a sincere effort to learn the game. If that sounds like you, this game can be very rewarding, can serve as a great introduction to the 3000AD universe, and provide you with many hours of space and planetary exploration, combat, etc.

On the other hand, if you're the type who will hop in, spend 5 minutes blindly clicking on everything before saying I don't know what I'm doing. This game sucks" and uninstall... you'd be better off sticking to more mainstream titles which offer more guidance. I don't say that as an insult. I say that because
